outline:
1. to be marvellous, be wonderful, be surpassing, be extraordinary, separate by distinguishing action
    1. (Niphal)
      1. to be beyond one's power, be difficult to do
      2. to be difficult to understand
      3. to be wonderful, be extraordinary
        1. marvellous (participle)
      4. (Piel) to separate (an offering)
      5. (Hiphil)
        1. to do extraordinary or hard or difficult thing
        2. to make wonderful, do wondrously
      6. (Hithpael) to show oneself wonderful or marvellous
kjv_def: accomplish, (arise...too, be too) hard, hidden, things too high, (be, do, do a, shew) marvelous(-ly, -els, things, work), miracles, perform, separate, make singular, (be, great, make) wonderful(-ers, -ly, things, works), wondrous (things, works, -ly).
strongs_def: properly, perhaps to separate, i.e. distinguish (literally or figuratively); by implication, to be (causatively, make) great, difficult, wonderful
